goal.en: Centered around the core material of 5G components, Silicon on Insulator (SOI), and its fabrication technology, this course aims to understand the material fabrication techniques of related advanced silicon-based components. The course objectives are to learn: 1. Production and fabrication of silicon crystal materials 2. Epitaxy and etching of silicon crystals: Formation of microstructures 3. Chemical Mechanical Polishing (CMP) technology 4. Ion implantation technology 5. Single-crystal thin film transfer technology: Smart-Cut Process 6. Fabrication techniques of electrochemistry based porous silicon nano-microstructures 7. Silicon-based lasers. The course will primarily involve studying relevant literature and reference materials. This approach not only helps students gain an in-depth understanding of silicon crystal material technologies, such as nanofilms, microelectronics, optoelectronics, biology, energy, and nano-micro electromechanical system components, but also teaches how to extract new knowledge from academic databases like journal literature
goal.ch: 以5G元件核心材料 Silicon on Insulator (SOI) 製作技術為討論主體，了解相關先進矽基元件之材料製作技術。課程目標為學習 (1) 矽晶材料的生產與製作 (2) 矽晶的磊晶與蝕刻：微結構的形成 (3) 化學機械拋光技術 (4) 離子佈植技術 (5) 單晶薄膜轉移技術：智切法 (Smart-Cut Process) (6) 電化學多孔矽奈米微結構製作技術 (7) 矽基雷射。 課程進行中以研讀相關的文獻參考資料為主體講授，除幫助學生深入了解矽晶相關材料技術，如奈米薄膜、微電子、光電、生物、能源及奈微微機電等元件製作之外，亦能學習如何從期刊文獻等學術資料庫汲取新知。

content.en:
This course is designed to stimulate students‘ self-learning motivation and desire to learn new knowledge. Progress is through the first six weeks of lectures on the properties of silicon crystal materials and related applications.
1. Silicon materials: properties and crystalline
2. Semiconductor Materials Chemistry
3. Implantation, CMP, and Epitaxial Growth processing
4. Microwave Material Processing
5. Layer transfer technology: Smart-Cut processing
6. Silicon on Insulator Material Technology
7. Semiconductor Electrochemistry
8. Fabrication of Semiconductor Nanostructure
content.ch:
本課程以激發同學自學精神而習得新知方法進行，進度是前六週採授課講解方式以研讀矽晶材料特質及其應用相關論文。
(1) 本課程前七週採取上課講解方式，讓修習同學建立基本概念。第八週起採取半翻轉教學方式 (Semi-Flipped Classroom Model)，即指定同學閱讀材料，在作簡報該週前討論內容。上課由被指定同學講解，討論，分享閱讀知識，再由老師做評論總結。本課程無家庭作業 (homework) 但有課堂作業 (classwork)及臨時課堂測驗。期末評分包含筆記整理內容。
1. 矽晶材料性質與晶體學
2. 半導體材料化學
3. 離子佈植技術、化學機械拋光、磊晶生長及相關先進製程
4. 微波材料製程
5. 薄膜轉移技術，智切法 (Smart-Cut)，原理及其應用
6. 絕緣層矽晶材料技術
7. 半導體電化學材料技術
8. 半導體奈米微結構製作
SUMMARY
本課程採翻轉教學，實施流程如下：指定閱讀材料及報告群 —> 週前討論 —> 課堂報告 —> 評分
無法參與週前討論者，請勿選修！
